Name: BRoS - Battle Royale of Survival
About the game: BRoS - Battle Royale of Survival is an action shooter game in which you'll confront other players with different characters and abilities and prove your skills. Complete different missions and achievements. Play and try to survive. Only then you will be the best. Be a Survivor. Current state: Early Access - Battle Royale of Survival: - Play with 10 unique characters and use their abilities wisely. - Fight against up to 20 other surivivors in a match. - Equip your characters with different weapons that can be found in the game to survive. - Unlock over 100 different outfits for your characters as well as for your weapons. - Fight your way to the top of the leaderboard . - You have access to the Battle Pass and you can also complete daily missions and achievements . Optional purchases available in the game. At the moment the game is in early access. In the near future we plan to release the full version.
